title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 15, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 15, 2022
description:
Mark and Gary link up to talk about the new and so far most serious charges coming out of the January 6th investigations and they highlight a somewhat bizarre story out of Michigan as well.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
